job.title: Automotive Test Engineer
job.description: ltpgtDynamic Research Inc a hightech applied research firm based in Torrance CA has an immediate opening for an analyticallyoriented Test Engineer to work in the automotive industryltpgtltpgtltstronggtAssignments will includeltstronggtltpgtltulgtltligtConducting instrumented dynamic and Advanced Driver Assistance Systems ADAS vehicle testing at our proving grounds near Bakersfield CA and occasionally at the proving grounds of our clients may at times involve night and weekend testingltligtltligtInstrumenting and preparing vehicles for testingltligtltligtWriting test reportsltligtltligtDeveloping test softwareltligtltligtAnalyzing dataltligtltligtDesigning new test equipmentltligtltulgtltpgtltstronggtRequirementsltstronggtltpgtltulgtltligtBS or MS degree in Mechanical or Aerospace Engineeringltligtltligt0  5 years of engineering experienceltligtltligtFamiliarity with MATLABltligtltligtStrong written and verbal communication skillsltligtltligtStrong automotive interestltligtltligtUS citizen or permanent residentltligtltulgtltpgtltstronggtStrongly desiredltstronggtltpgtltulgtltligtExperience with CADltligtltligtBackground in Dynamics and ControlltligtltligtFamiliarity with automotive sensors and data acquisitionltligtltligtMotorsports interest including performance driving experienceltligtltulgtltpgtampnbspltpgtltpgtDynamic Research Inc is headquartered in Torrance CA and has an office in Shafter CA near Bakersfield DRI was established in 1979 and specializes in applied research development and consulting in the areas of vehicle dynamics and control manmachine systems ergonomics biomechanics and structural mechanics In the automotive area this includes analysis simulation testing and prototype design and development DRI currently has a regular staff of 40 consisting of engineers and scientists technicians and support personnelltpgtltpgtampnbspltpgtltpgtDynamic Research Inc is an Equal Opportunity Employerltpgt
